languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс демонстративно прочищает горло.{/n} "Насколько мне известно, участие в этом Инквизиции доказано не было. Не стоит распускать сомнительные слухи. Это весьма неблагонадежно".

{n}Heinrix clears his throat.{/n} "As far as I know, the Inquisition's involvement in the matter was never proven. Spreading dubious rumours is a precarious habit that you would do well to abstain from."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс демонстративно прочищает горло.{/n} "Насколько мне известно, участие в этом Инквизиции доказано не было. Не стоит распускать сомнительные слухи. Это весьма неблагонадежно".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix carraspea.{/n} «Por lo que sé, la participación de la Inquisición en ese asunto nunca quedó demostrada. Propagar rumores de origen dudoso es una costumbre peligrosa de la que le recomendaría abstenerse».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat.{/n} "As far as I know, the Inquisition's involvement in the matter was never proven. Spreading dubious rumours is a precarious habit that you would do well to abstain from."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix carraspea.{/n} «Por lo que sé, la participación de la Inquisición en ese asunto nunca quedó demostrada. Propagar rumores de origen dudoso es una costumbre peligrosa de la que le recomendaría abstenerse».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは咳払いする。{/n}「我が知る限り、異端審問庁の関与が証明されたことはありません。怪しげな噂を広めるのはよろしくない習慣ですから、控えられたほうがよろしいでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat.{/n} "As far as I know, the Inquisition's involvement in the matter was never proven. Spreading dubious rumours is a precarious habit that you would do well to abstain from."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは咳払いする。{/n}「我が知る限り、異端審問庁の関与が証明されたことはありません。怪しげな噂を広めるのはよろしくない習慣ですから、控えられたほうがよろしいでしょう」

languages.text: {n}海因里希清了清嗓子。{/n}“据我所知，没有任何证据表明审判庭参与了这件事情。散布可疑的谣言是个危险的习惯，你最好改改。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat.{/n} "As far as I know, the Inquisition's involvement in the matter was never proven. Spreading dubious rumours is a precarious habit that you would do well to abstain from."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希清了清嗓子。{/n}“据我所知，没有任何证据表明审判庭参与了这件事情。散布可疑的谣言是个危险的习惯，你最好改改。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix räuspert sich.{/n} "Soweit ich weiß, wurde die Beteiligung der Inquisition an dieser Sache niemals bewiesen. Die Verbreitung dubioser Gerüchte ist eine gefährliche Angewohnheit, von der Ihr Abstand nehmen solltet."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat.{/n} "As far as I know, the Inquisition's involvement in the matter was never proven. Spreading dubious rumours is a precarious habit that you would do well to abstain from."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix räuspert sich.{/n} "Soweit ich weiß, wurde die Beteiligung der Inquisition an dieser Sache niemals bewiesen. Die Verbreitung dubioser Gerüchte ist eine gefährliche Angewohnheit, von der Ihr Abstand nehmen solltet."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix s'éclaircit la gorge.{/n} « Pour autant que je sache, l'implication de l'Inquisition dans cette affaire n'a jamais été attestée. Il est dangereux de propager des rumeurs aussi douteuses, et vous feriez bien de vous abstenir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat.{/n} "As far as I know, the Inquisition's involvement in the matter was never proven. Spreading dubious rumours is a precarious habit that you would do well to abstain from."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix s'éclaircit la gorge.{/n} « Pour autant que je sache, l'implication de l'Inquisition dans cette affaire n'a jamais été attestée. Il est dangereux de propager des rumeurs aussi douteuses, et vous feriez bien de vous abstenir. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "Bildiğim kadarıyla Engizisyon'un bu hususa dâhil olduğu kanıtlanmamıştı. Kuşkulu söylentiler yaymak, tehlikeli bir alışkanlıktır. Bu alışkanlıktan uzak dursan iyi edersin."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat.{/n} "As far as I know, the Inquisition's involvement in the matter was never proven. Spreading dubious rumours is a precarious habit that you would do well to abstain from."
